data.title: Pioneers Of Aviation
data.meta_description: Posts about Heavier-Than-Air written by mreman47
data.text:
History Behind The Card: Etrich Monoplane. Card #4 of 25, Lambert & Butler Cigarettes, Aviation series 1915 Igo (Ignaz) Etrich, December 25, 1879, in Trutnov, Bohemia (now part of the Czech Republic) – February 4, 1967, Salzburg, Austria; Alfred Friedrich, … Continue reading →

History Behind The Card: Nieuport Hydro-Monoplane. Card #3 of 25, Lambert & Butler Cigarettes, Aviation series 1915 Édouard de Nié Port, aka Édouard Nieuport, August 24, 1875, in Blida, Algeria – September 16, 1911, Charny-sur-Meuse, France; Charles de Nié Port, … Continue reading →

Card #2 of 25, Lambert & Butler Cigarettes, Aviation series 1915 Anthony Joseph Westlake, XXX, XX, 18XX, someplace in England, Great Britain – XXXX XX, 19XX someplace. This is the second article on the 25-card Aviation series issued in 1913 … Continue reading →

History Behind The Card: Mr. Gustav Hamel On Blériot Monoplane. Card #1 of 25, Lambert & Butler Cigarettes, Aviation series 1915 Gustav Wilhelm Hamel, June 25, 1889, Hamburg, Germany – May 23 (?), 1914 in the English Channel; Eleanor Josephine … Continue reading →

History Behind The Card: Yuri Gagarin Card #48 of 48, Lyons Maid, Famous People series 1966 Yuri Alekseyevich Gagarin, March 9, 1934 in Klushino, Russia, U.S.S.R – March 27, 1968 in Novosyolovo, Russia, U.S.S.R.; Gherman Stepanovich Titov, September 11, 1935, … Continue reading →

I don’t know why it has taken me so long to get around to providing my review of the book: To Caress the Air – Augustus Herring and the Dawn of Flight; Books One & Two. All I can say … Continue reading →

Card #53, Cigarettenfabrik Basma, German Men: A Collection of Famous Germans series 1934, German-language only issue. Manfred Albrecht Freiherr von Richthofen, born May 2, 1892, Breslau, Province of Silesia, Kingdom of Prussia, German Empire (present-day Wrocław, Poland) – April 21, … Continue reading →
